title: "Master the Art of Growing Tomatoes in Your Small Garden: Ultimate Guide for Garden Champions!"

tasks.task: Planting tomatoes in a garden bed
subtasks: Prepare garden bed with well-drained soil
Plant tomato seeds or seedlings at appropriate spacing
Ensure proper sun exposure (6-8 hours daily)
Protect from wind by choosing a sheltered spot
Amend soil with compost and aged manure
Keep plants hydrated, especially during hot months
Avoid overwatering to prevent root rot

tasks.task: Choosing tomato varieties for small gardens
subtasks: Consider varieties like patio princess, tiny tim, or bush early girl
Choose cherry or grape tomato varieties for high yields
Identify sunniest spot in the garden
Check for wind exposure and provide shelter if necessary
Bury up to two-thirds of the plant to encourage root growth
Apply compost or fertilizer at planting time
Repeat fertilizing every few weeks during growing season
